content.text: 0) In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first five ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@38:45 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large resealable plastic bag"@6:36 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "the first five ingredients"@46:72 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
		)
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a shallow bowl, beat the egg and milk.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "beat"@22:26 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a shallow bowl"@6:20 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the egg"@27:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "milk"@39:43 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Add chicken to bag, a few pieces at a time, and shake to coat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@7:14 / FOOD 
			:ref ing-7
			:ref ing-8)
		:ppt ( tool-2-0 "bag"@18:21 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "a few pieces"@23:35 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "shake"@51:56 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to coat"@57:64 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Dip into egg mixture, then return to flour mixture and shake again.
4) Remove from bag and let stand for 5 minutes.
5) Heat oil in a large skillet.
6) Fry chicken until golden brown on all sides.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Fry"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until golden brown on all sides"@15:46 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Reduce heat to medium and cook until a meat thermometer reads 180 deg, about 15 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Reduce"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@10:14 / OTHER )
		:gol ( temp-7-0 "medium"@18:24 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "cook"@29:33 / AC
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until a meat thermometer reads 180 deg"@34:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "15 minutes"@80:90 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
